short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read twice as fast by emphasising beginning of the words. Your brain will do the rest

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read faster and absorb more of what you read by reading the beginning of a sentence, a word, or even a letter. You will be surprised at how much you can read and comprehend by focusing on the beginning.

In the world of speed reading, a common advice is to read the bold text, which is the gist of the text and the most important information. The theory is that you can read twice as fast this way.

Read twice as fast by emphasizing the beginning of the words. Your brain will do the rest.
